docs.title: Bio
docs.text: I am a second-year undergraduate student majoring in Computer Science at Nankai University (NKU). Currently, I am an intern at Hvision, under the guidance of Prof. Qibin Hou.

docs.title: Research Interest
docs.text: • Computer Vision: I am committed to the CV field, especially in the field of visual object tracking and kownledge distillation.

docs.title: College of Computer Science, Nankai University
Media Exposures
docs.text: I write articles and share my thinkings on Zhihu regularly and have 200+ followers so far!

docs.title: Honors
docs.text:
• Scholarship of Public Interests and All-Round Capability, 2024
  • Second Prize of the National College Students Mathematical Modeling Contest (Tianjin Division)
  • First prize of the 16th Chinese Mathematics Competitions and first prize of the Tianjin Mathematics Competitions(2024)

中文English

我是南开大学计算机科学与技术专业的大二本科生，目前感兴趣的方向是计算机视觉（CV）。多多指教~

I am a sophomore in Nankai University majoring in Computer Science and Technology. My interests are in computer vision (CV). Thank you for your guidance!

docs.title: Blogs ✍
docs.text:
Abstract

个人博客，主要记录

  • 在计算机、人工智能、数学相关方面的学习，也会掺杂一些其它的领域；
  • 读书摘录，可能会有一些笔记；
  • 一些杂谈。

一些比较成体系的笔记会记录在 Notes 中。

本部分内容（除特别声明外）采用 署名-非商业性使用-保持一致 4.0 国际 (CC BY-NC-SA 4.0) 许可协议进行许可。
